Up Up Down Down

The podcast that takes a critical look at the craft of making games. Developers Allen Pike and Nigel Brooke dig in to a new topic each week with an interesting guest.

7. Criticizing Water For Being Wet

Scott Stevenson of Low Earth Orbit joins us to discuss game reviews, game-breaking bugs, and what’s wrong with Lara Croft getting impaled.

  • IGN’s Assassin’s Creed 3 Review
  • A few hundred of Skyrim’s bugs
  • Double Fine’s Hack and Slash
  • The VanCocoa meetup
  • Polygon’s Dragon’s Crown review
  • Polygon’s review policy
  • Tomb Raider, Torture Porn, and Looking For an Audience That Exists by Jeff Vogel
  • Fat Princess
  • inFamous for PS4
  • Old Man Murray’s Time to Crate Review System
  • Send us feedback on the show

Download (1:28:45) • Apr 04, 2014
